job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Title : Site Reliability Engineer Location : Cary, NC Duration                            : 12+ Months Rate                                      : OPEN Visa Status                         : ANY In-Person Interview      : No Relevant Experience (in Yrs.)  : 8+ Detailed Job Description: 8 Years E2E Technical Leadership - Reliability - Cloud, Monitoring, JAVA, Site Reliability, Monitoring, dev solutions Expertise in various types of monitoring familiarity with monitoring solutions for multi app, multi cloud platform, knowledge of APICA, SPLUNK, and home grown monitoring for batch, API, and distributed applications Expertise in devops practices & automation of deployments, monitoring, batch processes Ability to identify problems in current platform, propose and drive solutions through breadth of experience help diagnose and RCA production incidents Thanks And Regards Arun Kumar Reddy Technical Recruiter Ascii Group LLC Email: rec32@asciigroup.com Phone: (248) 476-7600 Ext 107 | (430) 260-3565
